domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to automobile, spacecraft, aircraft and boat manufacturing

data.text: @genyosha_ca @paul_winginit @Delta I worked for a Delta subsidiary for several years. One day a bag fell off of the baggage cart and got caught in the wheels and dragged across the ramp. I ran out and stopped the driver. The bag was destroyed! The flight was delayed and guess which passenger wanted her bag back…

data.text: @Delta just spoke with Matthew at the Diamond Desk, dude is on point. Impressive knowledge of systems and fast resolution. Great and friendly service. That’s the Delta that made me million miles kind of loyal. Just wanted to say thanks! #KeepClimbing #FlyDeltaJets

data.text: 🧿🧿 #HolidaysWithMarcus @generalelectric @GeneralMills @bp_America @Chevron @Disney @Starbucks @BestBuy @kohls @IBM @Verizon @Microsoft @AmericanAir @delta @SouthwestAir @united @JetBlue @Hilton Any other companies interested in joining @marcuslemonis on spreading holiday cheer? https://t.co/r1ZlmJjdRu
